author: MTV News Staff
title: This Financial Crisis Isn’t Young People’s Fault, But We Have The Most To Lose
description: Addressing the health impacts of the COVID-19 pandemic caused by the spread of the novel coronavirus is rightly not only the United States’ top priority, but the biggest priority in the world. It’s critical that people follow aggressive social distancing and …
content:
By Brent J. Cohen
Just over a decade ago, my roommate and I sat on the couch in our new apartment watching the news: Wall-to-wall coverage of people walking into shiny office buildings with empty boxes and walking out with their belongings. It was September … [+6233 chars]
